queries.name: Select simple
queries.query: select * from cbperf where `start`>1509548757903 and `start`<1509615358273 and channelId = 'CHAN_424'

queries.name: Reduced
queries.query: select `start`, `end`, `channelId`, `title` from cbperf where `start`>1509548757903 and `start`<1509615358273 and channelId = 'CHAN_424'

queries.name: Covered
queries.query: select `start`, `end`, `channelId` from cbperf where `start`>1509548757903 and `start`<1509615358273 and channelId = 'CHAN_424'
